info.description: microservice api wrapper around the business library
info.title: Business API

get.description: Returns a address entity based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found address entity

400.description: The address ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: An address does not exist for the ID specified.

post.description: DO NOT USE - STUB ONLY

400.description: Invalid event

post.description:
Publishes an event. The below events are supported
- CreditReviewEvent

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The name of the event to publish, case insensitive.

400.description: The event name is invalid, or the request body doesn't match the event model expected. See the API description for event models supported and their schema.

requestBody.description: The event object. The schema much match model for the eventName provided.

post.description: Find if eligible lender exist with given eligible lender data

200.description: responds with the appropriate eligible lender

400.description: There was an error with the request body params

500.description: Server error indicating that entity could not be created, due to repeated oppId and/or credit app id most likely.

post.description: Runs a goal seek algorithm to calculate the monthly payment for a loan.

parameters.name: loanStartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the loan.

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: The principal amount of the loan.

parameters.name: totalPeriodsMonths
parameters.description: The desired number of loan periods (months) over the life of the loan.

parameters.name: hasAchDiscount
parameters.description: Whether the loan has a discount for paying by ACH.

parameters.name: monthlyPaymentDollars
parameters.description: The monthly payment for the loan before the reamortization event, if one exists for the loan. This value is ignored on the calculate monthly payment endpoint.

parameters.name: reamortizedMonthlyPaymentDollars
parameters.description: The monthly payment for the loan after the reamortization event, if one exists for the loan. This value is ignored on the calculate monthly payment endpoint.

parameters.name: reamortizationPeriod
parameters.description: The number of months before the loan is reamortized.

parameters.name: promoPeriodLength
parameters.description: The number of months of the interest free promotional period for same as cash loans.

parameters.name: defermentPeriods
parameters.description: The number of months before between origination and when the first payment is due.

200.description: responds with the appropriate calculations in a FinanceCalculatorResponse

404.description: There was an error performing the calculations.

post.description: Runs a simple amortization algorithm to find the payoff date given a monthly payment and other loan parameters.

parameters.name: loanStartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the loan.

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: The principal amount of the loan.

parameters.name: totalPeriodsMonths
parameters.description: The desired number of loan periods (months) over the life of the loan.

parameters.name: hasAchDiscount
parameters.description: Whether the loan has a discount for paying by ACH.

parameters.name: monthlyPaymentDollars
parameters.description: The desired monthly payment for the loan before the reamortization event, if one exists for the loan.

parameters.name: reamortizedMonthlyPaymentDollars
parameters.description: The desired monthly payment for the loan after the reamortization event, if one exists for the loan.

parameters.name: reamortizationPeriod
parameters.description: The number of months before the loan is reamortized.

parameters.name: promoPeriodLength
parameters.description: The number of months of the interest free promotional period for same as cash loans.

parameters.name: defermentPeriods
parameters.description: The number of months before between origination and when the first payment is due.

200.description: responds with the appropriate calculations in a FinanceCalculatorResponse

404.description: There was an error performing the calculations.

post.summary: Generates the amortization schedule for the loan.
post.description: Runs a simple amortization algorithm to generate the payment schedule for the loan.

parameters.name: loanStartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the loan.

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: The principal amount of the loan.

parameters.name: totalPeriodsMonths
parameters.description: The desired number of loan periods (months) over the life of the loan.

parameters.name: hasAchDiscount
parameters.description: Whether the loan has a discount for paying by ACH.

parameters.name: monthlyPaymentDollars
parameters.description: The desired monthly payment for the loan before the reamortization event, if one exists for the loan.

parameters.name: reamortizedMonthlyPaymentDollars
parameters.description: The desired monthly payment for the loan after the reamortization event, if one exists for the loan.

parameters.name: reamortizationPeriod
parameters.description: The number of months before the loan is reamortized.

parameters.name: promoPeriodLength
parameters.description: The number of months of the interest free promotional period for same as cash loans.

parameters.name: defermentPeriods
parameters.description: The number of months before between origination and when the first payment is due.

200.description: responds with amortization schedule in a FinanceCalculatorAmortizationTable

404.description: There was an error performing the calculations.

post.description: Calculates data for the Truth In Lending Act disclosure.

parameters.name: estLoanStartDate
parameters.description: Estimated start date of the loan.

parameters.name: lenderId
parameters.description: Lender for the loan in question. Different lenders currently have different interest day count types.

200.description: responds with the appropriate calculations in a LoanCalculatorV3Response

404.description: There was an error performing the calculations.

get.description: Returns a status of 200 if the server is up

200.description: empty response

get.description: Returns build information and version of the app and some of its dependencies

200.description: build informaton

get.description: Returns build information and version of registered dependencies

200.description: dependencies build information

get.description: Returns build information and version of a specific library

200.description: library build informaton

get.summary: finds identity by credit application ID
get.description: Returns an identity with ssn and date of birth based on an credit application ID

200.description: responds with the found identity entity

400.description: The credit application ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A credit application does not exist for the ID specified.

get.summary: finds a loan object by ID
get.description: Returns a loan object based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found loan object

400.description: The loan ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A loan does not exist for the ID specified.

post.description: finds loan objects based on a collection of IDs. Duplicate IDs will be ignored

200.description: A collection of zero or more loan object

400.description: invalid json.

get.summary: finds a loan by loan agreement ID
get.description: Returns a loan object based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found loan object

400.description: The loan agreement ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A loan does not exist for the loan agreement ID specified.

post.summary: finds loans by loan agreement IDs
post.description: finds loan objects based on a collection of loan agreement IDs. Duplicate IDs will be ignored

200.description: A collection of zero or more loan object

400.description: invalid json.

get.description: Returns a list of active documents URLs for a given Loan and LoanServicer

200.description: Responds with a list of DocumentResponse

400.description: Servicer could not be parsed

404.description: Loan servicer ID did not match any Servicer

get.summary: finds a loan agreement by ID
get.description: Returns a loan agreement based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found  loan agreement entity

400.description: The loan agreement ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A loan agreement does not exist for the ID specified.

post.summary: gets the eSignature URL for a loan agreement
post.description: Returns a loan agreement eSignature URL based on an ID and role provided

200.description: responds with the found  loan agreement entity

400.description: The loan agreement ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A loan agreement does not exist for the ID specified.

put.description: Tries to countersign given loan agreement and returns most updated information after doing so

200.description: Responds with the most up to date loan agreement information after trying to countersign

404.description: A loan agreement does not exist for the ID specified.

post.summary: finds a list of loan agreements by IDs
post.description: finds loan agreement objects based on a collection of IDs. Duplicate IDs will be ignored

200.description: A collection of zero or more loan agreement objects

400.description: invalid json.

404.description: A credit application does not exist for the ID specified.

get.summary: finds a loan agreement by Credit application ID
get.description: Returns a loan agreement based on an credit application ID

200.description: responds with the found loan agreement entity

400.description: The credit application ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A credit application does not exist for the ID specified.

post.summary: find a loan agreement by credit application IDs
post.description: finds loan agreement objects based on a collection of credit application IDs. Duplicate IDs will be ignored

200.description: A collection of zero or more loan object

400.description: invalid json.

post.summary: finds a list of countersigned, active loan agreement by address or identity
post.description: Returns a list of countersigned, active loan agreement based on address or identity

200.description: responds with the list of loan agreement entities

post.summary: finds the total exposure for loan agreement by address or identity
post.description: Returns the total exposure based on address or identity

200.description: the total exposure

post.description: create a loan agreement for a given opportunity Id and link to the provided user ID.

200.description: A loan object

400.description: invalid json.

404.description: uuid, oportunity not found

get.summary: finds a loan product by ID
get.description: Returns a loan product entity including tiers based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found loan product entity

400.description: The loan product ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A loan product does not exist for the ID specified.

post.description: finds loan objects based on a collection of IDs. Duplicate IDs will be ignored

200.description: A collection of zero or more loan product objects

400.description: invalid json.

requestBody.description: a list of loan product ids

get.summary: finds loan products by branch ID
get.description: Returns a list of loan product entity including tiers based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found loan product entity

get.summary: finds a loan product by Tier ID
get.description: Returns a loan product entity including tiers based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found loan product entity

post.summary: Send a generic email to a borrower with opportunity created
post.description: Sends an email to a borrower

200.description: responds with and email entity id

400.description: Bad input data.

post.description: Creates an opportunity

200.description: responds with id of the new opportunity

400.description: Bad input data.

get.description: Returns an opportunity object based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found opportunity object

404.description: An opportunity does not exist for the ID specified.

put.description: Updates an opportunity object based on an ID

200.description: responds with result of true if successful

400.description: Bad input data.

404.description: An opportunity does not exist for the ID specified.

422.description: An input provided cannot be processed, e.g. opportunity status name not recognized

post.description: Creates home improvement change order by opportunity id.

200.description: responds with modified opportunity object

400.description: Bad request.

200.description: responds with result of true if successful

400.description: Bad input data.

404.description: An opportunity does not exist for the ID specified.

requestBody.description: opportunity loan product data to update

get.summary: finds emails associated with an opportunity by ID
get.description: Returns a list of Email objects based for the specified opportunity

200.description: responds with a list of email objects

post.summary: Advances the opportunity to the next logical status
post.description: Given an opportunity indicated by the opportunityId, transition the opportunity to the next logical status

200.description: responds with new opportunity status

400.description: requested to advance an opportunity did not succeed because one of the transition rules failed

post.summary: Records that the opportunity has signed its loan agreement and so has submitted its final credit application
post.description: Record in the opportunity_credit_application table that

200.description: Empty body

400.description: request to record final submission of an opportunity did not succeed for some reason

post.description: Create and return an opportunity credit application entity

200.description: responds with newly created OpportunityCreditApplication entity

500.description: Server error indicating that entity could not be created, due to repeated oppId and/or credit app id most likely.

requestBody.description: a request object containing opportunity id, credit disclosure type, credit application id, consent time, lender disclosure type

get.description: Validate is a opportunity applies for web bank

200.description: responds with verification about if the opportunity apply for web bank

400.description: Server error indicating that entity could not be validated.

post.description: Find origination events by id.

post.summary: Find origination events by date created and type.
post.description: Find origination events by date created and type.

get.description: Returns a partner entity based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found partner entity

400.description: The partner ID is missing or outside of a valid range.

404.description: A partner does not exist for the ID specified.

post.description: finds partners based on a collection of IDs. Duplicate IDs will be ignored.

200.description: A collection of zero or more partner objects.

400.description: partner IDs are missing or outside of a valid range.

get.summary: finds a partner login by  ID
get.description: Returns a partner login object based on an ID

200.description: responds with the found partner login object

404.description: A salesrep does not exist for the ID specified.

post.description: Creates a project

200.description: responds with id of the new project

400.description: Bad input data.

delete.description: Deletes a project, which really is updating the status of the project to cancelled

200.description: responds with id and status id of project

400.description: Bad input data.

get.description: Finds project with a given id

200.description: responds with the found project object.

404.description: A project does not exist for the ID specified.

get.description: Finds projects assigned to opportunity IDs

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Filter by type, multiple filter with OR condition

0 Unspecified

1 SolarSystem

2 Roofing

3 Windows

4 Doors

5 HVAC

20 Other

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Filter by status, multiple filter with OR condition,


0 New

10 Approved

20 Equipment Submitted

30 Equipment Approved

40 Installation Complete

50 Installation Confirmed

60 Inspection Complete

70 Final Confirmation

99 Cancelled

100 Unspecified

200.description: A collection of zero or more project objects.

post.summary: submits install complete for a project (update status and send email)
post.description: Submits instal complete for a project (update status and send email)

200.description: responds with id of project

500.description: Bad input data; project could not be updated to install complete.

post.summary: submits install confirmed for a project
post.description: Submits install confirmed for a project

200.description: responds with id

500.description: Bad input data; project could not be updared to install confirmed.

post.summary: sends the install complete email for a project
post.description: Sends the install complete email for a project

200.description: responds with id

500.description: Bad input data; project could not be updared to install confirmed.

post.summary: updates the status to install complete for a project
post.description: Updates the status to install complete for a project

200.description: responds with id

500.description: Bad input data; project could not be updared to install confirmed.

post.description: authenticates partner login

200.description: A unified login object

default.description: responds with the status code in the message

requestBody.description: the email, password, and ipList of user to be authenticated

get.summary: Get upload proof URL for given opportunity
get.description: Get upload proof URL for given opportunity

200.description: responds with a URL response object

404.description: Either the channel partner or opportunity entity do not exist.

post.description: Creates a user, This method will be used to generate a User in order to create a loan agreement.

200.description: responds with the new User object

400.description: Bad input data. Language not allowed.

post.description: Creates aan notification, This method will be used to generate a aan notification for opportunities.

200.description: responds with a list of opportunity ids of success aan notifications created and a list with the failures

requestBody.description: a list with AanNotificationCreateRequest which has opportunityId, notificationType and aanType:

get.summary: get a document response URLs for a given document id and time to live
get.description: returns a document response URLs for a given document id and time to live

200.description: responds with the found sign document url object

404.description: A document or a signed document url do not exist for the ID specified.

get.summary: get the bank information for the bank account of a specified channel partner
get.description: returns a BankAccountResponse object for the bank information of the partner

200.description: responds with the bank account object

404.description: A channel partner does not exist for the ID specified.

post.summary: creates or updates the bank information for the bank account of a specified channel partner
post.description: returns a BankAccountResponse object for the bank information of the partner

requestBody.description: account number, routing number, type, channel partner

200.description: responds with the bank account object

404.description: A channel partner or a bank account does not exist for the ID specified.

AddressValidationTypes.description:
### Status types:

**Unvalidated**  There hasn't been a recorded attempt to validate the addres.

**Successful**  The address has successfully been validated.

**Failed**  The address failed to validate.

AanNotificationsCreateResponse.description: list of opportunity ids with success aan notification created and list of opportunity ids with failure

streetTwo.description: optional second part of street address, e.g. appartment number

countyFipsCode.description: the 5-digit county FIPS (Federal Information Processing Standards) code. It is a combination of a 2-digit state FIPS code and a 3-digit county code assigned by the NIST

streetTwo.description: optional second part of street address, e.g. appartment number

AddressIdentityCreditAppRequest.description: combination of address, ssn and dob

creditApplicationId.description: reference to credit application to be excluded from response

AmortizationTablePeriod.description: finance calculator payment schedule for a single period

principalRemaining.description: The principal remaining at the end of the period, after the payment has been applied.

interestForPeriodDollars.description: The amount of the period payment that goes towards interest.

paymentForPeriodDollars.description: The payment for a given period.

totalInterest.description: The total outstanding interest on the loan.

AmortizationTableYear.description: finance calculator payment schedule for a given year

periods.description: A list of AmortizationTablePeriod entries for a single year of the loan

dateLastStatus.description: the date/time that we set the current status

dateSent.description: the date/time this email request was made

emailType.description: the type of this email, i.e. a summary of the purpose (loan app, credit decision, etc)

emailAddress.description: email address the message was sent to

recipientType.description: for now, all recipients are borrowers, but we anticipate tracking other types in the future

templateKey.description: if a template was used, the key for it

status.description: the most recent status of this email, as reported by the mail service

statusNotes.description: optional notes that provide more information about the latest status

state.description: user location state two letter abbrevation

lenderDisclosureTypeId.description: integer link to lender disclosure type id

pricePerWatt.description: optional field of price per watt

FinanceCalculatorAmortizationTable.description: finance calculator amortization schedule for the sales calculator estimation tool.

years.description: A list of year AmortizationTableYear entries of the amortization schedule for the loan

promoPeriodLength.description: The number of interest free periods for same as cash loans.

reamortizationPeriod.description: The number of periods (months) before the loan reamortizes.

FinanceCalculatorRequest.description: finance calculator request for the sales calculator estimation tool.

principal.description: The principal amount of the loan

totalPeriodsMonths.description: The number or periods (months) until the loan is repaid.

periodRatePercentage.description: The interest rate of the loan

lumpSumPayment.description: The amount of the loan to be repaid by the end of the remortization or promo period.

hasAchDiscount.description: Is the borrower enrolled in ACH and getting a discounted interest rate?

monthlyPaymentDollars.description: The monthly payment for the loan.

reamortizedMonthlyPaymentDollars.description: The monthly payment for the loan after the reamortization event.

reamortizationPeriod.description: The number of periods (months) before the loan reamortizes.

promoPeriodLength.description: The number of interest free periods for same as cash loans.

defermentPeriods.description: The number of periods after origination before the first payment is due.

FinanceCalculatorResponse.description: finance calculator response for the sales calculator estimation tool.

periodPaymentDollars.description: The calculated monthly payment before the reamoritization event. Otherwise the monthly payment for the full length of the loan.

reAmortizedPeriodPaymentDollars.description: The calculated monthly payment after the reamoritization event. Otherwise the same as periodPaymentDollars.

interestAccruedDollars.description: The interest accrued over the lifetime of the loan.

interestAvoidedDollars.description: The interest that did not accrue due to paying more than the minimum amount, or making a lump sum payment.

fullLoanLengthPeriods.description: The number of full periods of the loan.

totalPeriods.description: The total number of periods (months) in the lifetime of the loan.

FindByDateCreatedAndTypeRequest.description: Request origination events which were created within the given time period with a matching event type.

startTimeInclusive.description: Start of time period, inclusive of the given time.

endTimeInclusive.description: End of time period, inclusive of the given time.

choiceIntRate.description: the interest rate for the choice product in %

standardIntRate.description: the interest rate for the standard product in %

originalAmount.description: the portion of the loan (in dollars) that relates to the loan origination fee (including OM portion, if there is one) i.e. if dealer fee = 10% and loan_amount = $30000, origination_amount = $3000

choiceMonthlyPayment.description: the monthly payment for the choice product

standardMonthlyPayment.description: the monthly payment for the standard product

creditApplicationId.description: unique identifier for the credit application

phone1.description: primary phone number of the customer

phone2.description: secondary phone number of the customer

loanAmount.description: the loan amount of the loan

lender.description: the lender for this loan agreement

LoanAgreementSignatureUrlRequest.description: Configures request to fetch loan agreement e-sign url

LoanCalculatorV3Response.description: loan calculator response for the Truth in Lending Act disclosure on the loan agreement.

numRegularMonthlyPayments.description: Number of equal payments required, not including the final one that will be smaller.

dailyRateDiscounted.description: The daily interest rate including the ACH discount

annualRateDiscounted.description: The annual interest rate including the ACH discount

apr.description: Annual percentage rate for the loan

aprDiscounted.description: Annual percentage rate for the loan including the ACH discount

financeCharge.description: Total finance charge for the loan

financeChargeDiscounted.description: Total finance charge for the loan including the ACH discount

totalPayments.description: Total amount that the borrower will have to pay for the loan, including principal and interest

totalPaymentsDiscounted.description: Total amount that the borrower will have to pay including the ACH discount

monthlyPaymentDiscounted.description: Monthly payment including the ACH discount

finalMonthlyPayment.description: The final monthly payment, usually less than the regular payment

finalMonthlyPaymentDiscounted.description: The final monthly payment including the ACH discount

milestoneName.description: The name of the milestone being disbursed.

milestoneId.description: The ID of the milestone being disbursed. Empty for adjustment milestones.

principalAdvanceAmount.description: The amount of principal to advance for this disbursement.

name.description: common name, for internal use, unique across products

displayName.description: a name for display to installers; may not be unique across products, but unique with product groups an installer might have access to

minimumAmount.description: the minimum loan amount in dollars 1234.00

dealerFee.description: the origination fee as a percentage (9%)

approvedStates.description: list of states the partner is approved for, empty list means all are approved

creditRuleSet.description: Which credit ruleset (voter collection) to use for this product

promoPeriod.description: number of months in promo period (SAC loan)

reamortizationPeriod.description: number of months before loan reamortizes

defermentPeriods.description: number of months before loan starts

tiers.description: list of tiers for this loan product

eligibleLenderName.description: the name of the eligible lender

logMessage.description: message to put in log for update
message to put in log for update

result.description: was opportunity loan product updated successfully?

OriginationEventDataResponse.description: Contract for all origination event data.

OriginationEventResponse.description: Contains information about an event which happened in the origination system.

id.description: Universally unique identifier for this event.

offset.description: Tracks the order if this event in relation to other events.

created.description: The time at which the event was created.

effective.description: The time for which the event applies.

approvedStates.description: list of states the partner is approved for, empty list means all are approved

role.description: role of salesrepresentative which governs access

branchId.description: identifier of the channel partner branch

toEmailAddresss.description: borrower email, if none it will be use the one from the opportunity associated

substitutions.description: list of substitutions depending on the email template used, example %parter_name% -> "mosaic"

minScore.description: min aggregate score to qualify for this tier

rate.description: rate as a % ie (8.00 for a rate of 8%)

stdRate.description: standard rate as a % ie (8.00 for a rate of 8%)

rank.description: the order in which to evaluate the tier (1 is lowest risk, risk increases with rank increase)

maxLoanAmount.description: maximum amount of loan for tier

email.description: email used to try to log in

password.description: password used to try to log in

BankAccountRequest.description: request to update a bank account

channelPartnerId.description: unique identifier of the channel partner who owns the bank account

routingNumber.description: the routing number of the bank

existingAccountNumber.description: the account number currently on file

BankAccountResponse.description: return type for the GET of the bank account

accountNumberLastFour.description: the last four digits of the account number

routingNumber.description: the routing number of the bank

bankName.description: if we got it, the name of the bank (won't be there in the beginning)

IdsRequest.description: a list of loan agreement ids
